argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f j

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | istgp.1 | |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) |
| 2 |  | istgp.2 | |- I = ( invg ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_elin | |- ( G e. ( Grp i^i TopMnd ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ G e. TopMnd ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_anbi1i | |- ( ( G e. ( Grp i^i TopMnd ) /\ I e. ( J Cn J ) ) <-> ( ( G e. Grp /\ G e. TopMnd ) /\ I e. ( J Cn J ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( TopOpen ` f ) e. _V |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( f = G -> ( TopOpen ` f ) e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( f = G /\ j = ( TopOpen ` f ) ) -> f = G ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( f = G /\ j = ( TopOpen ` f ) ) -> ( invg ` f ) = ( invg ` G ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( f = G /\ j = ( TopOpen ` f ) ) -> ( invg ` f ) = I ) |
| 10 |  | #P_id | |- ( j = ( TopOpen ` f ) -> j = ( TopOpen ` f ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( f = G -> ( TopOpen ` f ) = ( TopOpen ` G ) ) |
| 12 | 11, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( f = G -> ( TopOpen ` f ) = J ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( f = G /\ j = ( TopOpen ` f ) ) -> j = J ) |
| 14 | 13, 13 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( f = G /\ j = ( TopOpen ` f ) ) -> ( j Cn j ) = ( J Cn J ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 14 | #P_eleq12d | |- ( ( f = G /\ j = ( TopOpen ` f ) ) -> ( ( invg ` f ) e. ( j Cn j ) <-> I e. ( J Cn J ) ) ) |
| 16 | 6, 15 | #P_sbcied | |- ( f = G -> ( [. ( TopOpen ` f ) / j ]. ( invg ` f ) e. ( j Cn j ) <-> I e. ( J Cn J ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_df-tgp | |- TopGrp = { f e. ( Grp i^i TopMnd ) | [. ( TopOpen ` f ) / j ]. ( invg ` f ) e. ( j Cn j ) } |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( G e. TopGrp <-> ( G e. ( Grp i^i TopMnd ) /\ I e. ( J Cn J ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_df-3an | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ G e. TopMnd /\ I e. ( J Cn J ) ) <-> ( ( G e. Grp /\ G e. TopMnd ) /\ I e. ( J Cn J ) ) ) |
| 20 | 4, 18, 19 | #P_3bitr4i | |- ( G e. TopGrp <-> ( G e. Grp /\ G e. TopMnd /\ I e. ( J Cn J ) ) ) |
